articles.title: Takata recall of 10M inflators could be last of air bag saga
articles.description: Takata is recalling 10 million more front air bag inflators sold to 14 different automakers because they can explode with too much force and hurl shrapnel
articles.content:
DETROIT --

articles.description: Pope Francis has cautiously waded back into the crowds after video of him slapping away the hand of an overly enthusiastic pilgrim went viral and sparked a papal apology
articles.content:
